FW EDUCATIONAL ASSISTANCE REQUEST Cc Thank you for your recent submission for your Educational Assistance Request Form Due to recent developments with Enron your Educational Request Form has been put on hold until we receive further instructions on how to proceed with our business Should you have any questions please contact your Human Resources Representative Thank you for your cooperation and patience HR Service Connection
